name: Google miminal
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This style makes google.com a way more simpler. You must try this one.
additional_info:
v. 1.0.3

- Fix white font in google maps

v. 1.0.2

- Settings is now visible in the footer
- Style now applies to all Google domains

v. 1.0.1

- Background around google voice icon fixed

v. 1.0.0

- Gmail Images Notifications & all apps opacity
- Search Bar simplify
- Hide unnecessary items
- Background change
